channel.title: {req}How to make a Random Item Chest{req}
channel.description: I was wanting to make a random iem cest on my 317 server! I wat a treasure chest where players can only use it once a day and it randomly give them a random item each time but only abl to useonce a day! I will rep or pay u paypal if helped!!
